name: The call of adventure
description:
You are a Wolf  in search of adventure, you leave your clan to confront the other, to see who is the strongest!

Beat the most ennemy you can.
Don't let ennemy approach you..
Dodge arrow or deflect them with your sword.
Ennemies spawn out of the screen and behind the trees.




Controls : 
Space : Attack

Hold Space: Charged Attack
Arrow : Move
Esc : Pause
